oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Display case featuring collection of materials related to Confederate Cavalry General John Hunt Morgan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Items include: piece of flag featuring Confederate cavalry General John Hunt Morgan's name, object identifies this as an "embroidered signature from his personal flag." Case also includes a signed receipt for the flag, a carte de visite of General Morgan, a pair of field glasses, and first edition book entitled "Morgan's Cavalry" written by brohter-in-law & chief of staff Basil W. Duke.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Books; Flags; Receipts; Tools and equipments
